Jyutping: ngo5 zi6 gei2 jat1 go3 jan4

English: Chicken speaks with duck (lit: Chicken talks to duck)
Formal way to say please or May I
I want to buy a red shirt
Jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 maai5 jat1 gin6 hung4 sik1 ge3 saam1

English: I’ll go to bars sometimes (the will in I’ll) - talking about usual habits
Refer to something you didn’t do in the past; didn’t
To not do something in the present or future; don’t
